panels.description: Total time spent in the statement.

targets.expr:
sum(rate(pg_stat_topsql_seconds_total{alias=~"$alias"}[$intv])) by (alias)
or
sum(irate(pg_stat_topsql_seconds_total{alias=~"$alias"}[5m])) by (alias)

(
sum(rate(pg_stat_topsql_seconds_total{alias=~"$alias"}[$intv] offset $diff_intv)) by (alias)
or
sum(irate(pg_stat_topsql_seconds_total{alias=~"$alias"}[5m] offset $diff_intv)) by (alias)
)
>= ((1-$use_diff)*100000000000000000000000000000000000000000)

panels.title: Total - SQL Time

panels.description: Number of times executed, in seconds

targets.expr:
sum(rate(pg_stat_topsql_calls_total{alias=~"$alias"}[$intv])) by (alias)
or

or

)
>= ((1-$use_diff)*100000000000000000000000000000000000000000)

panels.description: Top SQL ordered by Elapsed Time

targets.expr:
topk(200, 
     sum ((pg_stat_topsql_seconds_total{sql_text=~"(?s)(?i).*$filter.*", alias=~"$alias"} -
           pg_stat_topsql_seconds_total{sql_text=~"(?s)(?i).*$filter.*", alias=~"$alias"} offset $__range)
          or pg_stat_topsql_seconds_total{sql_text=~"(?s)(?i).*$filter.*", alias=~"$alias"})
    by (job, alias, instance, queryid, sql_text, datname, user) 
    )

topk(200, 
     sum ((pg_stat_topsql_calls_total{sql_text=~"(?s)(?i).*$filter.*", alias=~"$alias"} -
           pg_stat_topsql_calls_total{sql_text=~"(?s)(?i).*$filter.*", alias=~"$alias"} offset $__range)
          or pg_stat_topsql_calls_total{sql_text=~"(?s)(?i).*$filter.*", alias=~"$alias"})
    by (job, alias, instance, queryid, sql_text, datname, user) 
    )

topk(200, 
     sum ((pg_stat_topsql_rows_total{sql_text=~"(?s)(?i).*$filter.*", alias=~"$alias"} -
           pg_stat_topsql_rows_total{sql_text=~"(?s)(?i).*$filter.*", alias=~"$alias"} offset $__range)
          or pg_stat_topsql_rows_total{sql_text=~"(?s)(?i).*$filter.*", alias=~"$alias"})
    by (job, alias, instance, queryid, sql_text, datname, user) 
    )

topk(200,(
   sum(max_over_time(pg_stat_topsql_seconds_total{sql_text=~"(?s)(?i).*$filter.*", alias=~"$alias"}[$__range] offset $diff_intv) -
       min_over_time(pg_stat_topsql_seconds_total{sql_text=~"(?s)(?i).*$filter.*", alias=~"$alias"}[$__range] offset $diff_intv))
    by (job, alias, instance, queryid, sql_text, datname, user) 
)) >= ((1-$use_diff)*100000000000000000000000000000000000000000)

topk(200,(
   sum(max_over_time(pg_stat_topsql_calls_total{sql_text=~"(?s)(?i).*$filter.*", alias=~"$alias"}[$__range] offset $diff_intv) -
       min_over_time(pg_stat_topsql_calls_total{sql_text=~"(?s)(?i).*$filter.*", alias=~"$alias"}[$__range] offset $diff_intv))
    by (job, alias, instance, queryid, sql_text, datname, user) 
)) >= ((1-$use_diff)*100000000000000000000000000000000000000000)

topk(200,(
   sum(max_over_time(pg_stat_topsql_rows_total{sql_text=~"(?s)(?i).*$filter.*", alias=~"$alias"}[$__range] offset $diff_intv) -
       min_over_time(pg_stat_topsql_rows_total{sql_text=~"(?s)(?i).*$filter.*", alias=~"$alias"}[$__range] offset $diff_intv))
    by (job, alias, instance, queryid, sql_text, datname, user) 
)) >= ((1-$use_diff)*100000000000000000000000000000000000000000)

pg_stat_topsql_seconds_total{alias="$alias", queryid=~"$query_id.*"}

panels.description: Total time spent in the statement.

targets.expr:
sum(rate(pg_stat_topsql_seconds_total{alias=~"$alias", queryid=~"$query_id.*"}[$intv])) by (queryid)
or
sum(irate(pg_stat_topsql_seconds_total{alias=~"$alias", queryid=~"$query_id.*"}[5m])) by (queryid)

(
sum(rate(pg_stat_topsql_seconds_total{alias=~"$alias", queryid=~"$query_id.*"}[$intv] offset $diff_intv)) by (queryid)
or
sum(irate(pg_stat_topsql_seconds_total{alias=~"$alias", queryid=~"$query_id.*"}[5m] offset $diff_intv)) by (queryid)
)
>= ((1-$use_diff)*100000000000000000000000000000000000000000)

list.description: Input the query_id. minimum first 5 characters.
list.label: SQL Detail query_id (Min 5 chars.)
list.name: query_id

list.description:
previous days, You can input directly.
ex) 4d, 6w
list.label: Comp. Period
list.name: diff_intv
